description.oldValue:
,With this update, you will be able to detect and protect sensitive
content in images in SharePoint Online and OneDrive and subsequently apply DLP
policies to prevent exfiltration of that sensitive data. This release supports
key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, and BMP.
description.newValue: ,With this update, you will be able to detect and protect sensitive content in images in SharePoint Online and OneDrive and subsequently apply DLP policies to prevent exfiltration of that sensitive data. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP, and PDF (image only).
